about_the_game:
Mukti is a first person story exploration game.

“Embarking on his most significant excavation in the enchanting lands of Sundarbans, West Bengal, Vikram Roy sought to uncover the ruins of the Pala Dynasty. As the excavation neared its conclusion, news spread widely that Vikram and his colleagues were accused of orchestrating a mass killing of a tribe guarding the dynasty to obtain centuries-old artifacts from the site, forcing them to go on the run!”

Features

  • Uncover an intriguing mystery and embark on an emotional journey.
  • Immerse yourself in the breathtaking architecture of a museum adorned with a staggering collection of historical and cultural artifacts and scenes from India.
  • Experience real-motion video cutscenes featuring renowned actors, evoking emotions to drive the narrative.
  • Engage with a captivating story and narratives that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
  • Solve interactive puzzles that seamlessly intertwine with the storyline.
  • Explore age-old artifacts and gain insights into historical events throughout the museum.
  • Utilize an interesting camera functionality to capture pictures of fascinating artifacts and scenes in the museum, just the way you want.
  • Experience a game with a meaningful cause.
  • Access a custom-built dictionary that pops up to explain regional languages and words.
  • Immerse yourself in divine Indian music tailored to each scenario, keeping you thoroughly engaged.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6 or better
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512 MB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Open GL 2.1 Compliant GPU required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6 or better
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, ATI Radeon HD 5870 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Open GL 2.1 Compliant GPU required
